name: Party Wave (itch)
description:
Melrose Game Jam 2020 - The Theme is "Socializing"

Party Wave

Controls: WASD or left stick to turn left/right and lean forward/back.

Mouse drag - move camera

Space or Jump button to respawn 

Character models - https://syntystore.com/products/polygon-prototype-pack

Idle Pose animation - https://www.mixamo.com/
